attributes.action: Call a referendum as promised regarding the Lisbon Treaty
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The goverment, all parties involved promised us a referendum, upon the EU constitution, the Lisbon Treaty is simply a watered down version of the already rejected EU constitution. I believe that the great British public deserve to have their say.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
